user module

class user.User(env: Environment, id: int, from_station: Station, to_station: Station)

Bases: object

A class representing a user of the electric station simulation.

Attributes: - env (simpy.Environment): the simulation environment - id (int): the user’s ID - from_station (Station): the station where the user starts - to_station (Station): the station where the user wants to go - vehicle (Vehicle): the vehicle the user is using

run()

The main method of the User class, representing the user’s actions during the simulation.
